QuestData.Title: Seek Out the Lorewalker
QuestData.Description: I see that you and your people are desperate to find your Prince Anduin.$B$BI know someone who may be able to help you, a pandaren Lorewalker who knows this land better than anyone. I cannot guarantee what kind of reception you will receive, but he will almost certainly be as curious about you as you are of him!$B$BThe Lorewalker lives in the forest to the southwest. Tell him that the Pearlfin have sent you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search for Lorewalker Cho at the Dreamer's Pavilion in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: You look around the empty house.$B$BIt appears you are in the right place, but there is no sign of its inhabitant.
